title: Carrier Account Executive
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that encourages the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. Apple’s Sales organization generates the revenue needed to fuel our Product ongoing development and services.
description: Maintain an excellent relationship with assigned Carrier at executive and operational level and work with the Apple cross-functional teams to deliver a productive alliance and achieve mutual strategic outcomes. Build an effective planning and strategic partnership with Carrier and Apple other cross-functional teams. Develop the tactical plans and activities that will result in the successful over-achievement of Carrier iPhone and other Apple products targets...
